summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeKenra Volume Spray 25 provides the maximum amount of volume and hold possible. It leaves hair looking natural and shiny while imparting the strength and volume necessary to make any style last all day.
details: DetailsBenefitsSuper hold up to 120 hours*High humidity resistance up to 72 hours**Wind resistant up to 25 MPHFlake-free finishFast-drying formula*vs. untreated hair in high humidity conditions**vs. untreated hairItem 2084022How To UseFor super hold finish: Shake well. Hold can 8-10" away, and spray in short bursts. To build volume: Spray between layers at base. To secure long hair dressing: Spray over finished style.IngredientsAlcohol Denat., Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Butyl Ester of PVM/MA Copolymer, Glycerin, Aminomethyl Propanol, Parfum (Fragrance), Dimethyl Stearamine, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, PEG-75 Lanolin, Aqua (Water, Eau), PPG-5-Ceteth-20, Panthenol, Pentaerythrityl Tetracaprylate/Tetracaprate, Tocopherol, Hexyl Cinnamal.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: For super hold finish: Shake well. Hold can 8-10" away, and spray in short bursts. To build volume: Spray between layers at base. To secure long hair dressing: Spray over finished style.

reviews.headline: Great Hairspray
reviews.comments: It holds beautifully and isn't sticky. It's just great.

reviews.headline: After using for 30 years I DONT recommend!
reviews.comments: No longer has the hold it used to have. It's like buying a store brand now and they might as well remove "professional" and "25" off the bottle. It's not professional and doesn't have the hold the 25 had for years. On the search for another brand!

reviews.headline: Bring back the original #25! What have you done?!
reviews.comments: I have used this product for years. I noticed a major change in it this year.  WHAT HAVE YOU DONE? Spray is now like a forceful dry shampoo..hair gets blown everywhere...not where you wanted it placed. And it holds for a bit but not very long. I've tried to love it but it's impossible. This one is going back and I will try the Paul Mitchell Firm Style aerosol instead that someone recommended. Bring back the old #25!!

reviews.headline: L'OREAL HAS A GOOD LINE OF HAIR PRODUCTS
reviews.comments: I HAVE BEEN USING THIS FOR YEARS AND WOULD CHANGE IT FOR ANY OTHER

reviews.headline: I continue to buy this hairspray.
reviews.comments: Great hold all day!  Even in humid weather

reviews.headline: What's up with the changes, Kendra?!
reviews.comments: I have been using Kenra 25 for over 10 years. It WAS the best holding hairspray ever and I paid the price because of the consistent quality.  However, earlier this year, the smell changed and the hold became like water. It's now awful. What happened?

reviews.headline: Formula has changedâ€¦ not for the better!
reviews.comments: I have used Kenra 25 Volume spray for at least 10 years and so have my two daughters. The last 2 cans I purchased just seemed " different". Does not hold ,smells different and even sprays different. Very disappointed and will not purchase anymore.

reviews.headline: Why change a great product
reviews.comments: I have used Kenra 25 hairspray for years and has always been my gold standard hair product. They have completely changed the formula evidently. It now smells terrible and does not hold at all. Sorry Kenra but you have lost my loyalty. Hopefully there is another hairspray out there that compares to the original Kenra 25.

reviews.headline: What has changed??
reviews.comments: I have used this for so nany years snd was the only hairspray that worked for me!  Now it has a terrible smell and does not hokd at all.  Please advise!!

reviews.headline: Ratings are the only way I buy
reviews.comments: I ordered 5 cans of Kendra in March of 2024. My hair is fine in a bob style. After reading the reviews I wont purchase again. Was my go to hairspray but my stylist will recommend something else now.

reviews.headline: Formula Change
reviews.comments: I've used this volume spray for years with amazing hold and lightweight feeling. I recently ran out and purchased a new one. I knew right away it had changed from the scent to the hold! It makes my hair feel dry and no matter how much you use it still doesn't hold like before! Super disappointing! Bring back the old one! Like was it broken?! ðŸ™„

reviews.headline: My Go-To Hairspray!
reviews.comments: This is by far my favorite hairspray for curls. This spray adds volume and my curls hold for 24+ hours. I get complimented frequently and I owe it all to this spray.

reviews.headline: Formula change
reviews.comments: Thank you to those who have said , this spray has changed.  I have been using this for so many years and it has been a miracle worker for my baby fine /thin hair.  Completely agree with the person that said it is like spraying air at your hair.  I am so tired of spending the money on a now useless product.

reviews.headline: it is not the same.
reviews.comments: I am not sure what kenra did to their products, but this one no longer holds. I spray it on and it is gone. It does not hold my hair at all. I have been using it for years and they must have changed how the make it.

reviews.headline: Best Ever!!!
reviews.comments: This has been my go to hairspray for 15+ years!  Nothing holds my fine hair in humidity, wind, etc. like this hairspray. If I could give it more than 5 stars I would.  You will never go wrong with this product!

reviews.headline: No hold!!!!
reviews.comments: WHY did you change the formula?????!! This new formula does not hold AT ALL!! It makes my hair completely limp after about 30 min. Sally's has a generic version that works WAY better and a lot cheaper. I will be switching to that immediately.

reviews.headline: Favorite, works great on my fine hair!
reviews.comments: Amazing

reviews.headline: Agree with others this has changed!
reviews.comments: I just bought a new can and it is like spraying air on my hair! Not holding at all. So bummed because I loved this hairspray! It's definitely different.

reviews.headline: Something changed
reviews.comments: Not sure what changed with Volume Spray 25, however it no longer holds my hair at all! I've been using this spray for years and have been on a search to find something comparable. Wish they would have left this amazing product the same.

reviews.headline: Horrible nozzle
reviews.comments: Cant even use it. Nozzle is no good

media.headline: I've been using this product for a number of years. Love it!
Take it From a Southern Girl
I never go without this product! My hair is never too stiff,
I love this hair hair spray!!!!
It's the only hairspray I ever buy!
love it i buy it all the time it's one of the best
Great hairspray for people with thin hair

faceoff_positive.comments: I use this strong hold spray for when I want to curl my hair. My hair is naturally straight and doesn't hold curls well at all. I found this 2 years ago and I'm hooked! It's the only hair spray I'll use when I curl my hair. It's worth the price. I buy the bigger one just because I use it a lot to do my hair. My hair is also very long and thick.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Hold Hairspray EVER!

faceoff_negative.comments:
the new formula is terrible!!!!! terrible. it doesn't hold anymore. luckily i bought a jumbo bottle and was able to give that to my grandma. she LOVED kenra. she recommended it to me as a young girl and we've bonded over our hair care since childhood. shes a current cancer patient as well as a scalp melanoma survivor. her hair care, and covering her bald spot, has been one of the only things she feels confident in these days. it was heartbreaking to hear how upset she was about her favorite product not working for what she's been using it for for decades. 
it NO LONGER HOLDS. smells completely different and the ingredients are just vastly different from the original. extremely disappointing kenra.
faceoff_negative.headline: terrible change to the formula!
